T02TD1759E:250b-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02TD1759E:250b-3: dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs shes bya ba /
T02TD1759E:250b-5: lha mo dang bcas 'khor lo la //
T02TD1759E:250b-6: btud de nag po chen po yi //
T02TD1759E:250b-7: sgrub pa'i rim pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1759E:250b-8: dbang gis smin byas dam tshig ldan //
T02TD1759E:250b-9: bla ma la gus snying brtse gtong //
T02TD1759E:250b-10: shes rab bzod ldan brtson 'grus che //
T02TD1759E:250b-11: sgrub la dpa' ba'i sngags pa yis //
T02TD1759E:250b-12: yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas dag gam //
T02TD1759E:250b-13: ri bo dur khrod ma mo dang //
T02TD1759E:250b-14: gshin rje 'jigs su rung ba yi //
T02TD1759E:250b-15: gnas su nag po bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1759E:250b-16: mandala mchod dang gtor ma bsham //
T02TD1759E:250b-17: rten bshams bde ba'i stan 'dug ste //
T02TD1759E:250b-18: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor du //
T02TD1759E:250b-19: zhugs te cho ga rdzogs pa dar //
T02TD1759E:250b-20: bla ma la smod bstan la sdang //
T02TD1759E:250b-21: de dag rab tu zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD1759E:250b-22: bdag gis nag po bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1759E:250b-23: snyam du blo ni bskyed bya ste //
T02TD1759E:250b-24: phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams //
T02TD1759E:250b-25: skad cig stong par bsgom par bya //
T02TD1759E:250b-26: mdun du padma nyi ma la //
T02TD1759E:250b-27: gnas pa'i yi ge h'um nag po //
T02TD1759E:250b-28: bltas te de yi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1759E:251a-0: @251a * // gdug pa ma lus zhi byas te //
T02TD1759E:251a-1: 'gro kun bde ba la bzhag nas //
T02TD1759E:251a-2: slar 'dus h'um la thim gyur te //
T02TD1759E:251a-3: yi ge gyur pas skad cig gis //
T02TD1759E:251a-4: bya rog ming can nag po che //
T02TD1759E:251a-5: zhal gcig phyag bzhi g-yas pa na //
T02TD1759E:251a-6: dang po be tsa'i 'bras bu dmar //
T02TD1759E:251a-8: g-yon gyi dang po khrag chen gyis //
T02TD1759E:251a-9: rab tu gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD1759E:251a-11: stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing //
T02TD1759E:251a-12: dbu skra aag tshom smin ma ser //
T02TD1759E:251a-13: spyan gsum mche gtsigs 'jigs par byed //
T02TD1759E:251a-14: thod pa rin chen sbrul gyis brgyan //
T02TD1759E:251a-15: sna tshogs padma nyi steng du //
T02TD1759E:251a-16: dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD1759E:251a-17: de nas rang gi thugs ka yi //
T02TD1759E:251a-19: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la //
T02TD1759E:251a-20: mchod la dza:h'um bam ho: yis //
T02TD1759E:251a-21: dgug gzhug bstim dang mnyes par bya //
T02TD1759E:251a-22: spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru //
T02TD1759E:251a-23: padma nyi ma'i gdan stengs su //
T02TD1759E:251a-24: h'um dang a'a:dang aom gsum gyis //
T02TD1759E:251a-25: sku gsung thugs gsum byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1759E:251a-26: legs mchod bstod de de nas ni //
T02TD1759E:251a-27: aom ma h'a k'a la h'um phat /
T02TD1759E:251a-28: ces bya ba'i sngags ci nus par /
T02TD1759E:251a-29: man ngag bzhin du bzlas par bya //
T02TD1759E:251a-30: skyon gtor ma byin brlabs te //
T02TD1759E:251a-31: rang sngags kyis ni bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD1759E:251a-32: legs bar mchod la de nyid kyi //
T02TD1759E:251a-33: rkang pa brgyad pas bstod par bya //
T02TD1759E:251a-34: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi //
T02TD1759E:251a-35: las rnams gang yin de rtsol bya //
T02TD1759E:251a-36: ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu //
T02TD1759E:251a-37: blo ldan mtshan ma ma byung gi / bar du 'bad de bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1759E:251a-38: mtshan ma byung nas bla ma yi //
T02TD1759E:251a-39: man ngag bzhin du las la sbyor //
T02TD1759E:251a-40: bla ma'i gsung gi rjes 'brangs te //
T02TD1759E:251a-41: bdag gis nag po sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1759E:251a-42: bris pa'i bsod nams thob pa des //
T02TD1759E:251a-43: bgegs zhi thub dbang thob par shog / dpal nag po chen po sgrub pa'i thabs 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1759E:251a-45: // / pandi ta aa bha y'a ka ra dang /
T02TD1759E:251a-46: lo ts'a ba tsa mi chen pos bsgyur ba'o//
